name: WP Smart SEO
author: Eric-Oliver Mächler

sections.description:
A simple SEO Plugin which generates for Pages, Posts, Categories:

  • og:type
  • og:title
  • og:description
  • og:image
  • twitter:title
  • twitter:description
  • twitter:image
  • Meta Robots Tag: index, Follow, NoFollow, NoIndex

The plugin is new multilingual

Available in English & German

Plugin Recommendation

If you need a Sitemap for your WordPress – please install Simple XML Sitemap Generator

If you need a Google Analytics Plugin for your WordPress – please install Quick Google Analytics

short_description: Improve your WordPress SEO: Enter your title, description and featured image for better visibility in the search engine

  • og:image
